price: 23. (Xilkeygu waa) oo keliya Gaarsiinta (Xaqa) ka yimid Alle iyo Farriimahiisa (Towxiidka), qofkii caasiya Alle iyo Rasuulkiisa, hubaal wuxuu mudan Naarta Jahannama ay ku dhex waari weligood.
arabic: إِلَّا بَلَٰغٗا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِسَٰلَٰتِهِۦۚ وَمَن يَعۡصِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: illā balāghan mina al-lahi warisālātihi waman yaʿṣi al-laha warasūlahu fa-inna lahu nāra jahannama khālidīna fīhā abadan
